This folder configuration (`v24`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 24. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `GuessTheWordApplication` which has field `currentActivity` pointing to `Activity`); this is a memory leak
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `@drawable/rectangular_button` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/Theme.AppCompat.NoActionBar`)

The image `icon.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: mipmap-hdpi\icon.png: 333x333 dp (500x500 px), mipmap-mdpi\icon.png: 500x500 dp (500x500 px), mipmap-xhdpi\icon.png: 250x250 dp (500x500 px), mipmap-xxhdpi\icon.png: 167x167 dp (500x500 px), mipmap-xxxhdpi\icon.png: 125x125 dp (500x500 px)
